skills.name: Ionian Fervor
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever {{ci|Irelia}} hits an enemy champion with her abilities, or if she hits at least one non-champion, she will gain stacks, up to a cap.
{{sbc|Crest Mark:}} Enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} hit by ''{{ai|Flawless Duet|Irelia}}'' and ''{{ais|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}}'' initial barrage are [[File:Bladesurge 2.png|20px]] marked. The mark can be consumed by ''{{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}''.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Irelia''' gains a [[stack]] of ''Ionian Fervor'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by her [[Champion ability|abilities]], or if she hits at least one non-champion, stacking up to 5 times. ''Ionian Fervor'' lasts for 6 seconds, with basic attacks against enemy champions and large {{tip|monster|monsters}} and ability hits refreshing the duration.

{{sbc|Ionian Fervor:}} '''Irelia''' gains {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|8 to 16|1;7;13}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} per stack, up to {{as|{{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|8*5 to 16*5|1;7;13}}|attack speed}} at maximum stacks.
At maximum stacks, '''Irelia's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|{{pp|15 to 66}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Crest Mark:}} Enemy champions and large monsters hit by {{ai|Flawless Duet|Irelia}} and {{ais|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}} initial barrage are {{as|marked|buzzword}} for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Irelia gains a stack of Ionian Fervor for every enemy champion hit by her Champion ability, or if she hits at least one non-champion, stacking up to 5 times. Ionian Fervor lasts for 6 seconds, with basic attacks against enemy champions and large monsters and ability hits refreshing the duration.
Ionian Fervor: Irelia gains 1;7;13 ‒ undefined bonus attack speed per stack, up to 1;7;13 ‒ undefined at maximum stacks.
At maximum stacks, Irelia's basic attacks deal 15undefined − 66undefined (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage on-hit.
Innate - Crest Mark: Enemy champions and large monsters hit by Irelia's Flawless Duet and Irelia's Vanguard's Edge initial barrage are marked for 5 seconds. The mark can be consumed by Irelia's Bladesurge.

skills.name: Bladesurge
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Irelia}} {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}}, applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects, and {{tip|heal|healing}} herself.
If this attack kills the target, the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reset}}. Whenever a [[File:Bladesurge 2.png|20px]] mark is consumed, the cooldown is {{sti|ah|reduced}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|dashes}} 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals {{as|physical damage}}, applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects, and {{tip|heal|heals}} herself. ''Bladesurge'' deals '''bonus''' damage to {{tip|minions}}.
''Bladesurge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced to {{fd|0.2}} seconds upon consuming the {{as|mark|buzzword}} from a completed dash, and resets if the target dies to or during ''Bladesurge''.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia dashes 100 units through the target enemy's location, and upon collision or dash completion, she deals physical damage, applies on-hit effects, and heals herself. Bladesurge deals bonus damage to minions.
Bladesurge's cooldown is reduced to 0.2 seconds upon consuming the mark from a completed dash, and resets if the target dies to or during Bladesurge.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 85}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Minion Bonus Damage|{{ap|55 to 135}}|Minion Total Damage|{{ap|5+55 to 85+135}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}}}
{{st|Heal|{{as|{{ap|12 to 20}}% AD}}}}
skills.notes:
* ''Bladesurge'' will be buffered and cast when the cooldown ends or is reset if the player attempts to cast it within {{fd|0.5}} seconds of the cooldown ending/resetting.
* ''Bladesurge'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
* If the target dies during ''Bladesurge's'' dash, '''Irelia''' may cast her other abilities during the dash. 
* If the target dies to ''Bladesurge'' and was also {{as|marked|buzzword}}, the cooldown is still fully refunded.
* ''Bladesurge'' will only allow '''Irelia''' to dash through walls if there is enough space for her on the other side.
* ''Bladesurge'' deals its damage and consumes {{as|marks|buzzword}} when '''Irelia''' collides with the target, or at the end of the dash if the target moves away.
** ''Bladesurge'' will not deal damage if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} beforehand.
*** The damage will be dealt if the target is in collision range when the dash is interrupted however.
*** {{si|Flash}} will interrupt the {{tip|dash}} but '''Irelia''' will still collide with and deal damage to her target if the blink leaves her in contact with it at the new location.
** '''Irelia''' will complete her remaining dash distance even if the damage is dealt earlier.
** If the target is {{tip|untargetable}}, ''Bladesurge'' will instead deals its damage at the end of the dash, rather than on collision.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 60% AD)
  • Minion Bonus Damage:
  • Minion Total Damage: (+ 60% AD)
  • Heal: % AD

skills.name: Defiant Dance
skills.range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|775|Recast swipe missile range}} / {{tt|900|Recast swipe total range}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Irelia}} {{tip|channel|charges}} up, during which she {{tip|damage reduction|reduces}} incoming {{as|physical damage}}.

''Defiant Dance'' can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration. The recast cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}. {{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies nearby and within a line, increased based on how long she charged up.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' {{tip|channel|charges}} for up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds, during which she increases ''Defiant Dance's'' damage over the first {{fd|0.75}} seconds of the channel and {{tip|Damage reduction|reduces}} incoming {{as|physical damage}} by 50% {{as|(+ 7% per 100 AP)}}. ''Defiant Dance's'' charge cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.
''Defiant Dance'' can be recast within its duration, and does so automatically after the duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' swipes with her blades in the target direction, retaining ''Defiant Dance's'' {{as|physical damage}} reduction for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the recast is initiated and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies nearby and within a line, increased by {{pp|key=%|type=channel time|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 0.75|formula=10% per 0.075 seconds. ''This is capped at 0.75 seconds.''}}.

''Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}}. If {{ai|Ionian Fervor|Irelia}} would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the recast is initiated.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia charges for up to 1.5 seconds, during which she increases Defiant Dance's damage over the first 0.75 seconds of the channel and reduces incoming physical damage by 50% (+ 7% per 100 AP). Defiant Dance's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
Defiant Dance can be recast within its duration, and does so automatically after the duration.
Recast: Irelia swipes with her blades in the target direction, retaining Defiant Dance's physical damage reduction for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated and dealing physical damage to enemies nearby and within a line, increased by 0 to 0.75 ‒ undefined.
Defiant Dance's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control. If Irelia's Ionian Fervor would expire during the charge, it will instead refresh every 0.25 seconds for the remaining charge and be retained for 0.5 seconds after the recast is initiated.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|10 to 70}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 70*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* Enemies around '''Irelia''' will be dealt the damage once the recast's cast time ends, while enemies within the line are dealt the damage after a {{rutngt|0.05}} delay after the recast's cast time.
* Quick Casting utilizes hold-and-release for the two casts.
* ''Defiant Dance'' reaches 100% physical damage reduction at {{as|{{fd|714.29}} AP}}.
* ''Defiant Dance'' will also recast automatically upon entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The swipe will cast from wherever '''Irelia''' is at the end of the cast time.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Irelia''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|charge|cast=false|items=false|move=false|consume=Disabled, but can still use trinkets|spells=true,false,false,false,recasts|interrupts=death}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Damage: (+ 50% AD) (+ 40% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 100% AD) (+ 80% AP)

skills.name: Flawless Duet
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Irelia}} sends a blade to the target location for a short time.

''Flawless Duet'' can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically after the duration. The recast cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}. {{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if ''Flawless Duet'' was recast automatically.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' sends a blade to the target location for {{fd|3.5}} seconds. ''Flawless Duet'' can be recast after {{fd|0.15}} seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is channeling {{si|Teleport}}.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Irelia''' sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if ''Flawless Duet'' was recast automatically.

Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over {{fd|0.25}} seconds, afterwards dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within a line between them and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|sight|revealed}}.
''Flawless Duet's recast can be used while affected by {{tip|cast-inhibiting crowd control}} and during {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}} and the cast time of {{ai|Vanguard's Edge|Irelia}}.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia sends a blade to the target location for 3.5 seconds. Flawless Duet can be recast after 0.15 seconds while the blade is active, and does so automatically at the end of its duration, though not if she is channeling Teleport.
Recast: Irelia sends a second blade to the target location, or to her current position if Flawless Duet was recast automatically.
Once both blades have been placed, they fly toward each other regardless of distance and converge over 0.25 seconds, afterwards dealing magic damage to all enemies within a line between them and stunning them for 0.75 seconds, during which they are revealed.
Flawless Duet's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control and during Irelia's Bladesurge and the cast time of Irelia's Vanguard's Edge.
skills.notes:
* Both casts count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
** If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger and it will be considered as an ability activation. This is the only ability with this interaction in the game.
* ''Flawless Duet'' will recast automatically at its end during {{ai|Defiant Dance|Irelia}} despite being disabled.
* ''Flawless Duet'' will also recast automatically upon entering {{tip|resurrection}}.
* The blades will not stun nor deal damage if they fail to converge (i.e {{cai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}).
* '''Irelia''' can recast ''Flawless Duet'' during {{sis|Hexflash}} channel without interrupting it.
* Both of ''Flawless Duet's'' casts will be buffered and cast when their cooldowns end if the player attempts to cast each within {{fd|0.3}} seconds of their cooldown ending.

skills.name: Vanguard's Edge
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Irelia}} launches a barrage of blades in the target direction that expand outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
After expanding, the blades form a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for a short time. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Irelia''' launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit and briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} them.

After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them {{tip|airborne}}, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for {{fd|2.5}} seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
''The perimeter will point at the same angle '''Irelia''' casted it from, but based on the target's center.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Irelia launches a barrage of blades in the target direction, expanding outward upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit and briefly revealing them.
After expanding, the blades drop on the ground, knocking all enemy units away from them, though not rendering them airborne, and forming a spade-shaped perimeter around the enemy champion hit for 2.5 seconds. Enemies that pass through the blades for the first time are dealt magic damage and are slowed by 90% for 1.5 seconds.
The perimeter will point at the same angle Irelia casted it from, but based on the target's center.
skills.notes:
* Enemies that cross the perimeter are '''not''' {{as|marked|buzzword}} for {{ai|Bladesurge|Irelia}}.
* ''Vanguard's Edge'' will fire from '''Irelia's''' location at the end of the cast time.
